backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the backend API with product catalog, contact/idea submissions, orders, user profiles, shopping carts, language preferences, checkout sessions, and Stripe integration with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: replacing the header logo with TAPI OK brand image, setting permanent red header background (#D32F2F), updating theme brand color to red, and replacing home page chip image with brand logo.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, stores, and configuration files with details about TAPI OK branding, #D32F2F color scheme, animations, and multi-language support.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with custom CSS layer definitions for base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'TAPI OK - Tapioca Chips Online Store', root div, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with all application routes, QueryClient, ThemeProvider with manual initialization, LanguageProvider, InternalAuthProvider, AuthModalProvider, AuthModal, and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/AuthModal.tsx: Authentication modal dialog with tabbed login/signup forms, email/password validation, password strength indicator, visibility toggles, error handling, and integration with InternalAuthContext and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Mobile-optimized drawer component displaying shopping cart items with quantity controls, image fallback handling, and animations. Includes empty state, item management (add/remove/update), and uses Zustand cart store with internationalization support.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with three-column layout showing brand info, quick navigation links, and social media icons. Includes Caffeine.ai attribution link and dynamic copyright year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with navigation, cart icon with item count badge, theme toggle, language switcher, and user authentication controls. Features responsive mobile menu and integrates with internal auth context.
frontend/src/components/HeroBackground.t: Canvas-based animated background with particle system and gradient effects. Creates floating organic elements with golden/amber hues and smooth color transitions for hero sections.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Dropdown menu component for switching between four languages (English, Hindi, Tamil, Malayalam). Shows native language names and marks currently selected language.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that renders Header, Footer, ProfileSetupModal, and outlet for nested routes. Provides consistent page structure across the application.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Simple loading indicator component displaying an animated spinning chips image with configurable size options (small, default, large).
frontend/src/components/ProductSlider.ts: Auto-playing image carousel showcasing three product flavors with navigation controls, dot indicators, and entry animations. Features pop-up animation on mount followed by automatic sliding.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and email, then saves the profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileDispl: Displays a user avatar with their first initial and optionally their name below it, with hover animations.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthModalContext.t: React context that manages the open/close state of an authentication modal, providing openModal and closeModal functions.
frontend/src/contexts/InternalAuthContex: Provides internal authentication using localStorage for credentials, with login/signup/logout functions that sync with the backend actor for user profiles.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context that manages the current language selection (stored in localStorage) and provides translations via the `t` object.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with an admin token from URL params.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functions, identity state, and login status tracking using @dfinity/auth-client.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching products, user profiles, contact submissions, admin status, and submitting contact/idea forms via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system for light/dark themes, brand colors, and custom entrance animations (fadeInUp, slideInLeft, etc.) with motion preference support.
frontend/src/lib/productData.ts: Defines static product data for three tapioca chip flavors (Cheesy, Salty, and one more) with multilingual translations (English, Hindi, Tamil, Malayalam) including names, descriptions, ingredients, and dietary information.
frontend/src/lib/productHelpers.ts: Provides helper functions to extract localized product names, descriptions, and ingredients from Product objects based on the selected language.
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: Defines the Language type and comprehensive translation strings for the entire application across four languages (English, Hindi, Tamil, Malayalam), covering navigation, product details, cart, contact forms, and UI messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that checks user permissions and displays placeholder cards for product, order, and contact submission management features.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page displaying cart items with quantity controls, remove functionality, order summary with pricing, and empty cart state with navigation to products.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with two forms: a contact form for customer inquiries and an idea suggestion box, both with validation and toast notifications for submission feedback.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring an animated hero section with background effects, product highlights, call-to-action buttons, and a product slider showcasing tapioca chip offerings.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component (content truncated in provided source).
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure page with a red error icon, message, and buttons to retry payment or contact support.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a payment success page with a green checkmark icon, clears the cart on mount, and provides navigation to continue shopping or return home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information including image, description, ingredients, dietary badges, and quantity selector with add-to-cart functionality. Supports multi-language display and handles product not found states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all available products with cards showing images, names, descriptions, dietary badges, and add-to-cart buttons. Supports multi-language product information and navigation to product detail pages.
frontend/src/store/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing shopping cart state with persistence, including add/remove/update item operations, quantity management, cart clearing, and total price calculation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme colors (brand, golden), animations (float, fade-in, slide-in), container settings, and extended design tokens for the application.
project_state.json: Project state file for TAPI OK brand website tracking features for logo replacement, permanent #D32F2F red header color, and brand theme updates. Contains four existing features and four pending feature requests related to branding and color scheme implementation.
